body.p:
Hospital Ky Penetintiary
Aug 13. 1862
To His Excellency
Gov. B MaGoffin

The undersigned would state that T L Edwards a convict in the Ky Penitentiary sent for one year from the County of Taylor has been in bad health during the whole of the 6 months of his confinement and we, in the belief that his further confinement will result in the entire loss of health and probably of life recommend him as a fit subject of executive Clemency

Taylor Cir Ct
T S. Edwards
1 yr Penty
Grand Larceny
Pardon Issd Aug 15 1862
